name: GitHub
description: Comprehensive GitHub integration for managing repositories, issues, pull requests, commits, branches, webhooks, organizations, teams, gists, and more

create_repository.description: Creates a new GitHub repository. Can create in user account or organization.

org.description: Organization name (leave empty for user account)

get_repository.description: Retrieves details of a specific repository.

list_repositories.description: Lists repositories for authenticated user, specific user, or organization.

username.description: Username to list repos for (leave empty for authenticated user)

org.description: Organization name to list repos for

delete_repository.description: Permanently deletes a repository. Use with caution!

result.description: True if repository was successfully deleted

create_issue.description: Creates a new issue in a repository.

get_issue.description: Retrieves details of a specific issue.

list_issues.description: Lists issues in a repository with filtering options.

create_issue_comment.description: Adds a comment to an issue.

get_pull_request.description: Retrieves details of a specific pull request.

list_pull_requests.description: Lists pull requests in a repository.

get_commit.description: Retrieves details of a specific commit.

sha.description: Branch, tag, or SHA to start from

get_branch.description: Retrieves details of a specific branch.

list_branches.description: Lists all branches in a repository.

create_branch.description: Creates a new branch from a commit SHA.

delete_branch.description: Deletes a branch from the repository.

create_webhook.description: Creates a new webhook for a repository.

list_webhooks.description: Lists all webhooks for a repository.

delete_webhook.description: Deletes a webhook from a repository.

files.description: Files object with filename as key and content object as value

get_file_content.description: Retrieves the content of a file from a repository.

create_file.description: Creates a new file in a repository.

update_file.description: Updates an existing file in a repository.

delete_file.description: Deletes a file from a repository.

get_issue_comments.description: Lists all comments for an issue with pagination.

create_pull_request_review.description: Creates a review for a pull request (APPROVE, REQUEST_CHANGES, or COMMENT).

add_pull_request_reviewers.description: Requests reviewers for a pull request (users and/or teams).

remove_pull_request_reviewers.description: Removes requested reviewers from a pull request.

team_reviewers.description: Array of team slugs to remove

list_pull_request_reviewers.description: Lists requested reviewers for a pull request.

diff_branch_to_branch.description: Compares two branches and shows commits and file differences.

list_organization_members.description: Lists members of an organization with pagination.

list_workflows.description: Lists GitHub Actions workflows for a repository.

get_workflow_runs.description: Gets runs for a specific workflow with pagination.

list_user_repositories.description: Lists repositories for a specific user or authenticated user.

list_organization_repositories.description: Lists repositories for a specific organization.
